alert.note: Alert for Cadiz Basin; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 12:41AM PST until January 11 at 1:00PM PST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM PST /8 AM MST/ THIS MORNING TO 1 PM PST /2 PM MST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave and Kingman. In California, Needles and San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From 7 AM PST /8 AM MST/ this morning to 1 PM PST /2 PM MST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty northerly winds will blow around unsecured objects and could result in tree limb damage, minor structural damage and a few power outages. Periods of blowing dust could also reduce visibility to below 5 miles.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Cadiz Basin; San Bernardino County-Upper Colorado River Valley
